master-pipeliner

For any question refer to 
ds-mkt@llm.com.

## Getting Started
Install from [nexus](https://jira.odigeo.com/wiki/display/DS/Python+packages+repositories):


```sh
pip install llm-ds-prompt-chains
```

or from source
```sh
pip install -r requirements.txt
pip install -e .
```
